description: This file initializes a Milvus vector database, creates a PDF knowledge base, loads it, and uses an agent to answer a query about a recipe.

classes.name: Milvus
classes.description: A class representing the Milvus vector database connection and operations.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for creating a knowledge base from PDF URLs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration for specifying the type of search in Milvus.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, recreating it if specified.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
